Data_Identification_Information.Name_of_the_Dataset: aw_wbf_aug01to152024_03min_v01, Water Bodies fraction (3' x 3' grid interval)
Data_Identification_Information.Keywords: Water Bodies Images, Water Bodies fraction, Surface Water spread dynamics, Hydrological modeling, NRSC, ISRO, Thematic Services, Bhuvan
Data_Identification_Information.Use_Constraints: As per NRSC Data Dissemination Policy
Data_Identification_Information.Purpose_of_creating_data: Facilitating studies on Surface water Bodies

Citation.Data_Prepared_by: Water Resources Group, RSAA, National Remote Sensing Centre, Hyderabad.
Citation.Original_Source: Satellite data: Resourcesat-1/ Resourcesat-2 AWiFS Sensor

Abstract_describing_the_data.Data_Identification_Abstract: Fortnight time composite layers derieved from Resourcesat-2 AWiFS were for generation of water layer.

Data_quality.Accuracy: Overall accuracy is 93.5% with Kappa coefficient 0.821.
